title: Eri Bertsou on the 2015 Greek Election
itunes:author: Eri Bertsou
description: Contributor(s): Eri Bertsou | Department of Government PhD student Eri Bertsou discusses the recent Greek election and its implications, both for the future of Greece and the rest of Europe.
itunes:summary: Contributor(s): Eri Bertsou | Department of Government PhD student Eri Bertsou discusses the recent Greek election and its implications, both for the future of Greece and the rest of Europe.
